TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost

summary.span: Clase de WCF Data Services derivada de que se usa para crear instancias de servicios de datos.

span.span: The WCF Data Services class derived from used to instantiate data services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] no son entidades autónomo server.are not autonomous server entities. En su lugar, el servicio es un componente hospedado en un entorno como Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) que proporciona los medios de red de server core.Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities. En concreto, un servicio no enlazar y escuchar en un socket de red para las solicitudes entrantes a sus puntos de entrada de Representational State Transfer (REST).Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points. El host administra las interacciones directas con la red y admite el almacenamiento en caché, las escalabilidad y los módulos de autenticación.The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules. [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] define una interfaz de hospedaje genérica que resume su implementación de un host específico.defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. Esto permite [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] para ejecutarse en una variedad de entornos de hospedaje.This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. Para obtener más información, consulte [hospeda el servicio de datos](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] define una interfaz de hospedaje genérica que resume su implementación de un host específico.defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. Esto permite [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] para ejecutarse en una variedad de entornos de hospedaje.This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. Esta interfaz no debe confundirse con , que administra el registro y activación para el servicio.This interface should not be confused with , which instead handles registration and activation for the service. Valor predeterminado es se usa en este caso.A default is used in this case.
